label: 大社
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: kun pronunciation of taisha, before World War II, the Izumo Shrine, but now a title used also by a number of other important shrines [出雲]
